item.title: Report I-2024110024
item.description:
Report I-2024110024

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-10T12:20:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-07
  • City: Bay City
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: PVS TRANSPORTATION, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PVS Transportation driver was scheduled to deliver a shipment of Sodium Hydroxide to Michigan Sugar. The driver hooked up to the tank and the checked all the connections, confirmed the volume with the on-site attendant and started filling the tank. The on-site attendant employed by Michigan Sugar was watching the gage when the driver noticed the tank overflowing and initiated the emergency stop on the truck. This was near the end of the load. Driver reports that 20-30 gallons of material spilled out of tank and was cleaned up by the customer. 1
